related.comment: You must have the related block visible on the frontend already.

enabled.label: Enabled
enabled.comment: Enable or the showing of the also viewed products for this block.

listing_mode.label: Listing Mode
listing_mode.comment: The manner that existing associated products are handled.

maximum_existing_products.label: Max Existing Products
maximum_existing_products.comment: Maximum number of existing associated products that will be shown.

existing_sort_order.label: Existing Products Sort Order
existing_sort_order.comment: The way that existing products should be sorted.

maximum_products.label: Max Products
maximum_products.comment: The maximum number of products that will be displayed in the block

also_sort_order.label: Also Bought Product Sort Order
also_sort_order.comment: The way that the "Also Bought" products should be ordered. Useful for including some randomness

also_basket_size.label: Basket Size
also_basket_size.comment: When sort order is random it will select random products from the top X products. X is the basket size. This should be larger than the number of products you are displaying.

in_stock_required.label: Require In Stock
in_stock_required.comment: If disabled then out-of-stock products will not be shown.

category_filter_mode.label: Category Filter Mode
category_filter_mode.comment: If a category filter mode is selected, then products will only be displayed if they match the category
category_filter_mode.ewhelp:
• None - no category filtering will be done
  • Any - a product will only match if it matches at least one of the categories of the primary product
  • Current - a product will only match if it is within the current category
